Title: Establishes a co-shelter toolkit
Summary: Establishes a co-shelter toolkit of best practices, resources, case studies and other information deemed helpful to inform and encourage the implementation and sustenance of co-shelter models for victims of domestic violence and people experiencing homelessness with companion animals; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง459-bb, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing a statewide co-shelter toolkit
